original_title: Book on Easter Sunday carnage launched
original_body_lines: 'Sri Lanka's Easter Sunday Massacre: Lessons for the International Community,' penned by Dr. Rohan Gunaratna was launched today at the BMICH with the presence of distinguished guests, including Foreign Minister Ali Sabry, Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena and Additional Solicitor General Yasantha Kodagoda.
The book delves into one of the most tragic incidents in Sri Lanka's recent history - the Easter Sunday attacks in 2019. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
